title: Runners and Cyclists Use GPS Mapping to Make Art
description: Fitness apps and the power of live satellite tracking have allowed runners, cyclists and others to draw hearts, animals, birthday wishes — and even homages to Vermeer — across their local landscapes.

title: Silicon Valley Slides Back Into ‘Bro’ Culture
description: Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg and Marc Andreessen show how the tech industry’s insular culture remains largely unchanged.

title: This Surveillance Artist Knows How You Got That Perfect Instagram Photo
description: A tech-savvy artist unearthed video footage of people working hard to capture the perfect shot for Instagram. It is a lesson in the artifice of social media and the ubiquity of surveillance.

title: LinkedIn Ran Social Experiments On 20 Million Users Over Five Years
description: A study that looked back at those tests found that relatively weak social connections were more helpful in finding jobs than stronger social ties.
